fields.summary: Policy Management Issue Causes Odd Behavior

comments.body: As per [~sjones] in the bug scrub:  We do not permit account level "allow" effects, but added "deny" and "limit".

[~tjcramer], thanks.  If this is the case, then can we get a DOC bug created to fix the [Quotas section in the Eucalyptus Administration Guide|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/3.4/index.html#admin-guide/access_policy_quota.html]?  Thanks again for the clarification.

[~tjcramer], Is is currently expected that "Allow" effects cannot be used at the account level and that quotas on group policies are not supported. The documentation issue DOC-1004 exists to document changes made in 3.4.

I think it would be reasonable to add support for "Allow" effects at the account level and IMO it would be more useful if quotas attached to groups applied to users in those groups individually rather than being a quota for all users that group combined. 

I have not worked through the description in this issue as it is long and I do not currently have time so I may be missing something.
